name: Patty Dating Sim
description:
You wake up, do you sleep in for school or do you wake up and peruse your dream of being with patty. 

This game is about the main protagonist trying to get with Patrick Godson. The player will meet lots of friends on the way and will have to make some hard choices so that the dream of being in Patty's arms will become a reality.

Multiple endings, Try and get them all!
